summary: A university professor and a team of students conduct an experiment on a young woman, uncovering terrifyingly dark, unexpected forces in the process.
cast: Jared Harris|Sam Claflin|Erin Richards|Rory Fleck Byrne|Olivia Cooke|Laurie Calvert|Aldo Maland|Max Pirkis|Tracy Ray|Richard Cunningham|Eileen Nicholas|Rebecca Scott|Aretha Ayeh|Max Macintosh|Harman Singh|Ben Holden|Caoimhe Judd|Carly Bramwell|Nick Owenford
title: El estigma del mal
